series_title: Automated Clearing House Completed Forms and Set-up
series_description: This series consists of signed authorizations and
retention_statement: Retain until superseded, obsolete, or rescinded, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents the schedule(s) of monthly prinicipal and interest payments for the life of the loan.
retention_statement: Retain 10 years after loan payoff/termination then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_title: Audit Guide/Operations Manual/ Department Policy and Procedure Records
series_description: This series documents multifamily requirements for completing audits of financial statements on multifamily properties and internal processes of the Multifamily Servicing department's day-to-day business.
retention_statement: Retain until superseded, obsolete, or rescinded, then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series consists of spreadsheets of properties currently financed under bond resolution for which Virginia Housing Development Authority (VHDA) seeks to issue more bonds.
retention_statement: Retain 2 years after bonds are issued then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents the amounts that are collected at the closing and set up of a loan in the Strategy system.
retention_statement: Retain 10 years after loan payoff/termination then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents the amount of VHDA loans in specific multifamily financing.
retention_statement: Retain until final payment of the loan then return to the borrower/trustee.

series_title: Default/Payment Change Letters This series consist of changes in payment records outside of escrow analyses and notices of default. Series is used in response to requests made by third parties such as Department of Housing and Urban Development (HUD) and auditors.
retention_statement: Retain 10 years after loan payoff/termination then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents monthly multifamily loan delinquencies and is used for historical reporting and trending.
retention_statement: Retain 50 years after completion of report then destroy in compliance with No .8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents calculations of the amount of funds needed to pay taxes and insurance.
retention_statement: Retain 10 years after loan payoff/terminiation then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series consists of bills that have been paid from escrowed accounts and copies of checks for overages. This series may include, but is not limited to: payments of taxes and insurance, waiver/claim loss, and reserves to the property.
retention_statement: Retain 7 years after payment is made then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_title: Department of Housing and Urban Development Loans Reserves Authorizations The series
series_description: consists of authorizations and HUD documentation for the approval to make payments from reserve accounts.
retention_statement: Retain 10 years after loan payoff/termination then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series consists of the insurance policies and evidence of insurance coverages on each property.
retention_statement: Retain until superseded, obsolete, or rescinded then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents the interest adjustments made to the Mutlifamily Strategy Servicing System.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years or until audit, whichever is longer, then destroy on compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.
Retain 10 years after loan payoff/termination then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_title: Ledger Reports for Subsidy This series consist of ledgers for subsidy contracts and HUD subsidy contracts.
retention_statement: Retain 10 years after contract ends then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_title: Loan Set Up/ First Payment Letters
series_description: This series documents how the loan was set up in the Strategy system. This series may include, but is not limited to: initial system edits and first payment letters.
retention_statement: Retain 10 years after loan payoff/termination then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents the confirmation of daily movement of multifamily mortgage payments and escrow reserve funds by the Online Treasury Management system (OTM) processes.
retention_statement: Retain 18 months after confirmation date then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series consists of all documentation pertaining to the loan and the pay off of the loan.
retention_statement: Retain 10 years after final payment then destroy in compliance with No.8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series consists of forms regulated by HUD to budget and requisition section 8 project based subsidy funds. This series may include but is not limited to:budgets, subsidy requisitions, year end reconciliations and financial statements, and posting back up.
retention_statement: Retain 5 years after end of current fiscal year or until audit, whichever is later, then destroy in compliance with No.8 on schedule cover page.

series_description: This series documents VHDA's qualification and approval for a property to participate in maintaining a portion of the reserves in tax-exempt investments. This series may include, but is not limited to: the initial tax exempt investment worksheet and
retention_statement: Retain 10 years after loan payoff/termination then destroy in compliance with No. 8 on schedule cover page.
